project: WTFDIN - What The Fuck Do I Need?

requirements.description: User can add a new character with a name
stepsToVerify: Click 'Add Character' button
Enter character name in prompt/modal
Confirm creation
Verify new character appears in character list
Verify character is selectable

requirements.description: User can delete an existing character
stepsToVerify: Select a character from the list
Click 'Delete' button
Confirm deletion in confirmation dialog
Verify character is removed from list
Verify associated job data is also removed

requirements.description: User can rename an existing character
stepsToVerify: Select a character from the list
Click 'Rename' button or edit name field
Enter new name
Confirm change
Verify character list shows updated name

requirements.description: User can select a character to view/edit
stepsToVerify: Click on a character in the sidebar list
Verify main panel updates to show selected character's details
Verify selected character is visually highlighted in list

requirements.description: User can add a job to a character via job picker
stepsToVerify: Select a character
Click 'Add Job' button
Verify job picker modal/grid appears with all FFXIV jobs
Verify each job shows its icon from XIVAPI
Click on a job icon
Verify job is added to character's job list
Verify job's gear table is initialized with BiS preset data

requirements.description: User can remove a job from a character
stepsToVerify: Select a character with at least one job
Click remove/delete button on a job tab
Confirm deletion
Verify job is removed from character's job list
Verify job's gear tracking data is deleted

requirements.description: User can switch between jobs on a character
stepsToVerify: Select a character with multiple jobs
Click on different job tabs/pills
Verify gear table updates to show selected job's data
Verify correct job is visually highlighted

requirements.description: Job icons display correctly from XIVAPI
stepsToVerify: Open job picker or view jobs on a character
Verify job icons load from XIVAPI CDN
Verify icons display at appropriate size
Verify fallback text shows if icon fails to load

requirements.description: Gear table displays all 11 equipment slots
stepsToVerify: Select a character and job
Verify table shows rows for: Weapon, Head, Body, Hands, Legs, Feet, Earrings, Necklace, Bracelets, Ring1, Ring2
Verify each row shows slot name and type (Raid/Tome)

requirements.description: Raid gear slots show single 'Have' checkbox
stepsToVerify: Select a job with raid BiS items
Locate a slot marked as 'Raid' type
Verify only one checkbox is displayed
Check the checkbox
Verify checkbox state persists after page refresh

requirements.description: Tome gear slots show 'Base' and 'Upgraded' checkboxes
stepsToVerify: Select a job with tome BiS items
Locate a slot marked as 'Tome' type
Verify two checkboxes are displayed: 'Base' and 'Upgraded'
Verify both can be checked independently (Base alone is valid)
Verify checkbox states persist after page refresh

requirements.description: Checking 'Upgraded' automatically checks 'Base' for tome items
stepsToVerify: Select a job with tome BiS items
Locate a tome slot where 'Base' is unchecked
Check the 'Upgraded' checkbox
Verify 'Base' checkbox is automatically checked
Verify both checkboxes show as checked

requirements.description: Gear table loads correct BiS preset for each job
stepsToVerify: Add multiple different jobs to a character
Switch between jobs
Verify each job's gear table shows the correct hardcoded BiS configuration
Verify slot types (Raid/Tome) match the preset for that job

requirements.description: Visual indication of slot completion status
stepsToVerify: View gear table with mixed completion states
Verify incomplete slots have distinct visual style
Verify partially complete tome slots (Base only) have distinct style
Verify fully complete slots show as complete (e.g., green highlight)

requirements.description: Cannot have two raid rings
stepsToVerify: Select a job where both Ring1 and Ring2 are set to Raid type
Attempt to check 'Have' on both rings
Verify system prevents or warns about invalid combination
Verify only one raid ring can be marked as obtained

requirements.description: Cannot have two tome rings at same upgrade level
stepsToVerify: Select a job where both rings are Tome type
Check 'Base' on Ring1 (not upgraded)
Attempt to check only 'Base' on Ring2 (not upgraded)
Verify system prevents or warns about duplicate base tome rings
Verify checking 'Upgraded' on one ring makes the combination valid

requirements.description: Valid ring combinations are allowed
stepsToVerify: Verify raid + tome (any state) is allowed
Verify raid + upgraded tome is allowed
Verify upgraded tome + base tome is allowed
Verify all valid combinations can be saved and persisted

requirements.description: Per-job completion progress is displayed
stepsToVerify: Select a character and job
Verify progress indicator shows (e.g., '3/11 slots complete')
Check additional gear checkboxes
Verify progress updates in real-time
Verify tome slots count as complete only when fully upgraded

requirements.description: All data persists in localStorage
stepsToVerify: Create a character with jobs and gear progress
Close the browser tab
Reopen the application
Verify all characters, jobs, and gear states are restored
Verify selected character/job state is reasonable on reload

requirements.description: Data saves automatically on every change
stepsToVerify: Make a change (add character, check box, etc.)
Do NOT click any save button
Refresh the page immediately
Verify the change was persisted

requirements.description: Export button generates shareable URL
stepsToVerify: Create some characters with jobs and progress
Click 'Export URL' button
Verify URL is copied to clipboard (or displayed)
Verify URL contains base64-encoded data in query parameter
Verify URL is valid and can be pasted into browser

requirements.description: Opening URL with data parameter prompts import
stepsToVerify: Export data from one browser session
Open the exported URL in a new browser/incognito window
Verify import prompt appears asking to import data
Accept the import
Verify all character, job, and gear data is restored correctly

requirements.description: User can decline import and keep existing data
stepsToVerify: Have existing data in localStorage
Open a URL with different data in query parameter
Decline the import prompt
Verify original localStorage data is preserved
Verify imported data is not applied

requirements.description: Corrupt or invalid URL data is handled gracefully
stepsToVerify: Manually craft URL with invalid base64 in data parameter
Open the URL
Verify application does not crash
Verify appropriate error message is shown
Verify application falls back to localStorage or empty state

requirements.description: Application uses dark mode theme
stepsToVerify: Load the application
Verify background is dark (e.g., near-black or dark gray)
Verify text is light colored for contrast
Verify all UI elements follow dark theme consistently

requirements.description: Layout has sidebar for characters and main panel for details
stepsToVerify: Load the application
Verify sidebar on left shows character list
Verify main panel on right shows selected character details
Verify layout is visually balanced

requirements.description: Application is responsive on mobile devices
stepsToVerify: Open application on mobile device or resize browser to mobile width
Verify layout adapts (e.g., sidebar collapses or stacks)
Verify all interactive elements are tap-friendly (min 44px)
Verify gear table is usable on small screens

requirements.description: Interactive elements have hover/focus states
stepsToVerify: Hover over buttons, checkboxes, and clickable elements
Verify visual feedback on hover
Tab through interactive elements
Verify focus states are visible for accessibility

requirements.description: Application uses only vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
stepsToVerify: Inspect index.html source
Verify no external JavaScript libraries are loaded (no React, Vue, jQuery, etc.)
Verify no CSS frameworks are loaded (no Bootstrap, Tailwind CDN, etc.)
Verify application functions correctly with just native browser APIs

requirements.description: Application works as static files without server
stepsToVerify: Open index.html directly in browser via file:// protocol
Verify all features work (except possibly XIVAPI icons due to CORS)
Verify localStorage functions correctly
Verify no server-side dependencies
